summary:
Dynamic and creative professional with substantial experience in managing overall facets of film, TV production as well as overseeing multimedia projects in fast-paced and demanding environments.

I wear many hats and always looking for a new challenge and opportunities to work with creative agencies & production companies on film and motion picture to create engaging powerful content with a lasting impact.

projects.title: TedxAmsterdam 2016
projects.description:
Speaker Coach and Live translator

I was hired by TedxAmsterdam to coach and live translate a speech for Raed El Saleh the founder and leader of the White Helmets group in Syria.

My first responsibility was to help him generate strong talking points and draft the into a compelling speech. Secondly, I coached him on the use of body language, tone, and the number of words and sentence structures to deliver a powerful speech. 

I was also asked to do a live translation of his semi-structured speech for the audience.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H16L0p9Dp1k

profile_positions.description:
Award winning film director and producer with three finished short films and two in development. Develop creative concepts and write and produce short films and commercials for various clients. Produce films, commercials, broadcast, and events. 

Selected Accomplishments:
- Head of Casting at Yanga Casting's Amsterdam Office
- Producer, project manager and Floor Manager for Booking.com live shows, conferences, and other projects. 
- Produced and directed an award winning short film "Boom", with another short and a feature in development.
- Produced and 1st ADed "In Battle", a short film shot in London. 
- Lead training programmes on storytelling and filmmaking to support organisations in becoming creative and professional storytellers. 
- Streamlined pre-production of two episodes for Al Jazeera Arabic's high-budget international travel show.
profile_positions.title: Creative Producer & Director

profile_positions.description:
* Delivered successful and smooth dynamic productions for multiple well-known international brands including Booking.com, Red Bull and Indeed as well as on live-streaming renowned music festivals like the Amsterdam Dance Event and Above & Beyond Group Therapy (ABGT).
* Built client trust in my ability to detect problems, adapt to ongoing changes, recognise important information and formulate and execute practical and creative solutions, and ensure delivery of final products. 
* Managed project budgets of 70K and above, handled the overall management of expenditure, approving invoices,  hiring crew, and renting equipment.
profile_positions.title: Senior Producer

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop and maintain internal guidelines and advice on the use of communications and outreach channels and content contributions. This includes the website, social media, and related tools. 
•	Developing and providing relevant guidance to the Administrative Unit team, the GCTF membership, and GCTF implementing organizations and other partners.
•	Developed and currently implementing a communications strategy and a social media strategy that included launching a revamped website and new social media accounts. 
•	Contribute to the process of and coordinate the production of GCTF visuals and interactive content such as videos and podcasts.
•	Collect, design, plan, and coordinate content for the GCTF newsletter.
•	Contribute to the GCTF Style Guide, the GCTF Key Messages Guide and the GCTF Activity Guidelines and maintain the brand and visual identity of the Forum on all communications platforms. 
•	Maintaining and populating the web environment and social media channels
•	Collect, design, plan, and coordinate content for the GCTF newsletter.
profile_positions.title: Communications and Outreach Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Became Interim Head of Communication after six months and kept the department operational for the following year.
•	Developed and continue to implement a social media strategy and policy that showed a 50% increase in followers within 18 months.
•	Coach and train researchers on how to present themselves in an interview for a broadcast outlet.
•	Produce and manage the institute's communication channels, public relations and internal communications (website, newsletters, targeted emails, social media, videos, articles).
•	Advise on best practices and strategy based on monitoring and evaluating analytics.
•	Integrate and train new interns and employees to ensure their effectiveness and productivity within the team.
•	Introduced video storytelling and have since produced and directed 20+ promotional and content videos.
•	Increase the Institute's visibility through effective strategy and campaign design including handling budget, planning and progress tracking.
•	Coordinate internal resources and third parties for flawless execution of communication efforts for various projects.
•	Ensure and maintain house style and brand consistency across all platforms.
profile_positions.title: Communications & PR Officer / producer

profile_positions.description:
Communications and Consulting:
•	Oversaw the rebranding process (new website development, social media, mission & visions, strategy) for Kingston Business Academy and produced all the stationary and elements of a visual identity for the new brand. 
•	Coached a Tedx Amsterdam speaker on effective storytelling and helped him craft and deliver his story in an engaging way. I also live translated his talk from Arabic to English (2016). 
•	Researched and created a database of 200 potential Arabic writers for a new storytelling platform - Saba Consultants (Dubai, 2016). 
•	Translated a short documentary from Arabic to English and added subtitles for Vj Movement (Amsterdam, 2016).
•	Researched the impact of images of refugees on people's emotions and attitudes in the Netherlands (See video below).
•	Assisted in the production of Al Jazeera’s Fault Lines documentary on Bahrain "The US and the New Middle East: The Gulf" (2011).

Training and Workshops:
•	Developed a training design on career development and skills for youth in Iraq (2019).
•	Delivered a one day training program on cyber security for journalists 101 for young European Journalists in Antwerp (2017). 
•	Conducted a workshop for citizen journalists on verification tools (Beirut, 2015).
profile_positions.title: Multimedia Producer and Communications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Reconstructed the social media strategy for project “Ma3akom.”
•	Coproduced and hosted a short video on my journey volunteering in Lesvos and helping refugees arriving at the shore.
•	Wrote the concept paper/proposal for a project focusing on urban refugees, which got accepted.
•	Translated scripts and subtitles.
•	Grew the online Syrian community on Facebook.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Published breaking news or trending stories in the Middle East and North Africa
•	Gathered citizen media reports and embed them in story pages in the form of updates
•	Edited and approved stories and reports added by citizen journalists
•	Hosted Global Voices Google Hangout series and interviewed activists from Lebanon and Brazil

Published articles: 
https://globalvoices.org/author/faten-bushehri/
profile_positions.title: Writer and Show host

profile_positions.description:
•	Promoted from Production Assistant to Associate Producer in 18 months and filled in for producers regularly.
•	Wrote headlines and scripts and assisted the director in the control room.
•	Produced in-house packages, visual and social media content, and recorded the voice-over for news packages and international promos 
•	Assisted in the production and direction of at least six live shows per week.
•	Updated the bigger production team and newsroom on upcoming shows and topics in weekly meetings.
•	Created five rundowns per week for on-air shows using ENPS and filled in for producers
pre and post production
•	Pitched topics for upcoming shows and selected and edited relevant visual components and soundbites. 
•	Monitored and completed post-production processes and ensured shows were edited and ready for re-runs on air.
•	Coordinated the activities of guests, line producers, translators, directors, show host, and other personnel throughout the production process.
profile_positions.title: Associate Producer

profile_positions.description:
• Wrote, shot, and edited daily news packages (five a week) for local channels in the Middle East using Mini DV, XL1, XL2 and DVC60 cameras.
• Assisted in the production and direction of the main talk show including finding guests and coordinating their appearance.
• Made creative decisions on filming, location, and directed the reporter in the field.
• Oversaw all elements of pre-production, production and post-production, from concept to completion.
• Wrote and edited the script, and recorded the voice over for all news packages.
profile_positions.title: Producer and Director

volunteer_experiences.description:
•	Managed a team of 10+ volunteers
•	Communicated with key stakeholders from the Red Cross, Municipality of Amsterdam,
and a homeless shelter
•	Established a working system for new volunteers
•	Mediated communicated between new arrivals and authorities by translating
•	Built and sustained relationships with refugees Organized follow up visits to refugee
camps to assess needs

volunteer_experiences.role: Head of Information and Media Relations
volunteer_experiences.description:
•	Create media campaigns in collaboration with other organizations
•	Manage and proofread content for the English website
•	Write and translate press releases and statements
•	Strengthen outreach and expand the network in the Netherlands
•	Organize public events and lobby in for Bahrain in the European Union

•	Raised over ten thousand Euros in ten days
•	Coordinated the logistics and travel of six volunteers to Lesvos
•	Worked closely with camp managers in Lesvos to identify and provide needs like food,
medical supplies, and sleeping bags
•	Mediated between arriving refugees and medical groups on the North shores of Lesvos
through translation
•	Connected volunteers with appropriate NGOs on the ground to maximize the support on
the ground
